title: Mid Laner
body:
Hello

The only midlaner I have really been playing is Annie, and she is good.
However, I feel like I now want to play a midlaner who requires a bit more skill and/or there are a bit more mechanics involved. 

I have narrowed it down to {{champion:103}}  or {{champion:7}} . Who do you guys think I should buy?

Also, is there someone else I should consider? If so, plz let me know.

Thx, AcerArena

replies.body:
Depends on what you want to do more:

Lb = Escape + Burst dmg
Ahri = Single out opponents + burst dmg

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ANvhIThZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-10T04:59:09.694+0000)
>
> Depends on what you want to do more:
> 
> Lb = Escape + Burst dmg
> Ahri = Single out opponents + burst dmg

Do you personally have a preference?

Well, if you want my opinion:

LeBlanc has a good burst dmg rate, her ulti helps a lot with that burst dmg (2 w's within 2 seconds)
But Ahri has a better poke with her Q and if she gets ganked her E,  ulti and Q will help. Her Q also has a healing passive.

But I'm a Zed player :P
I hate going up against Ahri the most, LB 4 me is quite the opponent, if you want to try out new stuff
If you like Annie I would recommend Lux, Viktor, Vel'koz and Veigar aside from the ones youve mentioned, all of them are strong, fun to play and not commonly played (with the exception of Viktor)
